script: Armand Junior Dongmo Notue is a Data Scientist with extensive expertise in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP, and Reinforcement Learning. His work highlights his ability to develop real-time AI solutions and optimize predictive models to drive business impact. Key projects include the development of an 88.3% accurate BERT-based sentiment analysis model, an AI-driven job market insights platform with a 20% improvement in hiring strategies, and a real-time fraud detection system that increased fraud detection accuracy by 35%. Notue also has hands-on experience in cloud computing and MLOps, having worked on AWS SageMaker and Docker projects. His educational background includes a Master of Science in Data Science from Grand Canyon University (in progress) and a Master of Engineering in Reservoir Management from the University of Douala. Notue's technical skills encompass Python, SQL, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Tableau, and various NLP and machine learning frameworks such as XGBoost and Transformers. He has also developed custom neural networks from scratch using NumPy and has experience with clustering techniques like K-Means and Hierarchical Clustering to enhance customer segmentation efforts. His professional affiliations include the American Statistical Association, IEEE Computer Society, and the Association for the Advancement of Artificial Intelligence. Notue's career highlights his dedication to leveraging AI and data science to solve complex challenges in various industries.
